tool_description:
REST Countries v1
Get information about countries via a RESTful API
name: REST Countries v1
title: REST Countries v1

api_list.name: Search by calling code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://restcountries-v1.p.rapidapi.com/callingcode/57"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "restcountries-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://restcountries-v1.p.rapidapi.com/callingcode/{code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "restcountries-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get by country codes

required_parameters.name: codes
required_parameters.description: list of 2-letter of 3-letter country codes separated by semi-colon

api_list.name: Get by country code

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
